mapper.select: SELECT NO, NAME, PRICE, TYPE, categoryType, noLocation, noDounor, dounorNo, nickname, profile, noSpot, picname, picType, r FROM(SELECT NO, NAME, PRICE, TYPE, categoryType, noLocation, noDounor, dounorNo, nickname, profile, noSpot, picname, picType, rownum r FROM(SELECT s.NO, s.NAME, s.PRICE, s.TYPE, s.CATEGORY_TYPE categoryType, s.NO_LOCATION noLocation, s.NO_DOUNOR noDounor, d.no dounorNo, d.nickname, d.profile, p.no_spot noSpot, p.picname, p.type picType FROM spot s, dounor d, spotpic p WHERE s.NO_DOUNOR = d.no AND s.TYPE = 'F' AND s.no = p.no_spot AND p.type = 'K' ORDER BY 1 DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(type) FROM spot WHERE type = 'F'

SELECT NO, NAME, PRICE, TYPE, categoryType, noLocation, noDounor, dounorNo, nickname, profile, noSpot, picname, picType, r FROM(SELECT NO, NAME, PRICE, TYPE, categoryType, noLocation, noDounor, dounorNo, nickname, profile, noSpot, picname, picType, rownum r FROM(SELECT s.NO, s.NAME, s.PRICE, s.TYPE, s.CATEGORY_TYPE categoryType, s.NO_LOCATION noLocation, s.NO_DOUNOR noDounor, d.no dounorNo, d.nickname, d.profile, p.no_spot noSpot, p.picname, p.type picType FROM spot s, dounor d, spotpic p WHERE s.NO_DOUNOR = d.no AND s.TYPE = 'T' AND s.no = p.no_spot AND p.type = 'K' ORDER BY 1 DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
